name: Cherry Aid
description: Cherry Aid is a PC video game for all kind of audiences starting from 3 years old and 2D platformer enthusiasts. This game features all sorts of different plants, berries and fruits. Player starts his journey as a Cherry girl, who desperately wants to become happy and to help other fruits with their problems. In the quests, Cherry girl helps and protects fruits from angry flies and other enemies, who seek to spoil the fruity kingdom.
